name: Three JS Firebase Multiplayer
body:
# ThreeJSFirebaseMultiplayer
A Three JS Multiplayer game using Firebase, by Me, [Tyly04](https://github.com/Tyly04/). Just so you know, I didn't add the walking around and collision detection. 
This was thanks to: 
[Web Maestro](https://github.com/WebMaestroFr/collisions-detection-three-js)

I got the inspiration from [jgordon510](https://github.com/jgordon510) and [Firebase Asteroids](https://mmoasteroids.firebaseapp.com/).
I used the 3D Javascript Engine [ThreeJS by Mr. Doob](https://threejs.org).
You can check out the Github Project [here](https://github.com/Tyly04/ThreeJSFirebaseMultiplayer).
You can play the game (Bug testing, in progress) [here](https://www.threejs-multiplayer.firebaseapp.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
